import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')
x = np.linspace(-2,2,1000)
y1 = np.sqrt(1-(abs(x)-1)**2)
y2 = -3 * np.sqrt(1-(abs(x)/2)**0.5)
plt.plot(x, y1, color="pink")
plt.plot(x, y2, color="pink")  
plt.xlim([-3.5, 3.5]);
